narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Family Care Connections LLC is a Home Health provider based in Glendale, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $23.7M in Medicaid payments across 208K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $23.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
